summary: Build a TikTok-to-YouTube video converter app.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Minimal modern logo mark featuring a stylized play button and conversion arrows, warm neutral palette (tt2yt-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Flat illustration of a phone video transforming into a widescreen video frame, warm neutral palette, no text (tt2yt-hero.dim_1600x900.png)

existing_features.title: Create a single-page app that lets a user paste a TikTok video URL, validates the URL, and initiates retrieval of the source video for conversion.

Implement a conversion workflow that outputs a YouTube-ready MP4 file and allows the user to download it locally (no automatic upload to YouTube). Provide basic conversion presets for common YouTube formats (e.g., Shorts 9:16 and Standard 16:9) and show the chosen output settings before export.
Add a results screen that previews the converted video in-browser and displays practical guidance for uploading to YouTube manually (step-by-step text).
Persist a lightweight conversion history (TikTok URL, timestamp, chosen preset, output filename) so users can revisit prior conversions from the UI. Do not store raw video bytes on the backend.
Define a coherent, distinctive visual theme for the app (colors, typography, spacing, component styling) and apply it consistently across all screens. Do not use a blue+purple palette.

Add generated static image assets (logo and simple hero illustration) and render them in the UI (e.g., header/logo and landing/empty state). Store images under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them directly from the frontend.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create an app that converts TikTok videos for uploading/using on YouTube.

projectName: TikTok to YouTube Video Converter App
